mapper.insert: insert into review_interview ( member_num, ri_subject, ri_content, ri_date, ri_readcount) value ( #{memberNum}, #{riSubject}, #{riContent}, #{riDate}, #{riReadcount})
mapper.select: SELECT r.ri_num, r.ri_subject, r.ri_date, r.ri_readcount, r.member_num, m.member_id FROM review_interview r JOIN member m ON r.member_num = m.member_num order by ri_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select i.re_num, m.member_id ,i.re_subject, i.re_content, i.re_date, i.re_readcount from review_employment i join member m where i.member_num = m.member_num order by re_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into review_employment ( member_num, re_subject, re_content, re_date, re_readcount ) value ( #{memberNum}, #{reSubject}, #{reContent}, #{reDate} ,#{reReadcount})
